mapper.select: select * from clause order by clausename asc
mapper.insert: insert into clause(project_id, clausename, description, cType, cOrder, cLevel, fatherclause_id) values(#{project_id}, #{clauseName}, #{description}, #{cType}, #{cOrder}, #{cLevel}, #{fatherClauseID})
mapper.update: update clause set project_id=#{projectName}, clauseName=#{clauseName}, description=#{description}, cType=#{cType}, cOrder=#{cOrder}, cLevel=#{cLevel}, fatherclause_id={fatherClauseID} where clause_id=#{clause_id}
